SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the game. It contains the player's username, its PawnColor, its starting card and the hand. It also contains the list of deployed CardSides and the player's score, as well as the secret objective to fulfill. Lastly, the class contains an array of integers to store the resources obtained by the player.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • OFFSET

      public static final int OFFSET
      This value is used to compute the relative coordinates with ease. The starting card is assumed to be placed at the center of the matrix, in position (40,40).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • getAvailablePlacements

      public boolean[] getAvailablePlacements(int index)
      A method that identifies which Corners on a placed CardSide are available for a card's placement. Given the index of a placed card, it returns a boolean array to identify what corners are available for the placement (indexes: 0 for TL, 1 for TR, 2 for BR, 3 for BL).
      Parameters:
      index - index of a placed CardSide
      Returns:
      array of booleans to identify what Corners are available for the placement

    • retrieveNeighbours

      public CardSide[] retrieveNeighbours(int[] coord, int[] dir)
      A method that given the index of a CardSide and a direction (corner), retrieves the "other 3 vertices of the square". IN ORDER: moving along x, along y and diagonally
      Parameters:
      coord - array of coordinates
      dir - array of directions
      Returns:
      an array of neighbours CardSides

    • placeCardSide

      public boolean placeCardSide(CardSide toBePlaced, int index, int corner)
      A method that adds the CardSide to player's deployed and placements, adds the deployedID, checks on which cards it's being placed and calls for updates.
      Parameters:
      toBePlaced - the CardSide to be placed
      index - the index where the CardSide is to be placed (-1 for the starting)
      corner - the corner where the CardSide is to be placed (for the starting put whatever)
      Returns:
      true if the placement was successful, false otherwise

    • computeResources

      public void computeResources()
      A method that computes the resources of the player based on the deployed CardSides and the resources associated with their visible Corners. It is called only after the placement phase.

    • updateHand

      public void updateHand(PlayableCard drawn_card, PlayableCard deployed_card)
      A method that updates the player's hand by replacing a deployed PlayableCard with a drawn PlayableCard. The method eliminates both the placed and non-placed CardSides of the deployed PlayableCard, then adds the new one to the hand.
      Parameters:
      drawn_card - the PlayableCard drawn to be placed in the hand
      deployed_card - the PlayableCard in the hand to be replaced

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(CardSide deployed_card)
      A method that updates the player's score after a CardSide has been deployed.
      Parameters:
      deployed_card - CardSide deployed

    • updateScoreObjectiveCard

      public int updateScoreObjectiveCard(ObjectiveCard objectiveCard)
      A method that updates the player's score if an objective has been fulfilled. This method is called only at the end of the game.
      Parameters:
      objectiveCard - The ObjectiveCard containing the objective to fulfill.
      Returns:
      The points awarded to the player
